income_messages:
From: s**********9@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-29 22:12:38
SUBJECT:   Dear Sir,
  Dear Sir,
I write you as an independent financial consultant with the Central bank of Nigeria, which the Federal Government of Nigeria (FGN) asked to investigate some of the unclaimed payment of clients which they (FGN) believe should have been sorted out over the years, but for some reasons still remained unpaid.
It is my duty to investigate such case, and during my investigation I came across your unpaid claim file tagged FGN/CBN 3310-29281, and when I investigated further, I noticed what the problem was all about a simple policy, which with my office I can handle and get your name shortlisted for immediate payment.
However, it is imperative that I let you know what must be done with emphasis on the word “MUST” be done before you can be shortlisted for immediate release of your long-awaited payment.
You must provide the contract invoice for the payment you are claiming, in addition to that, you are to provide both the cross border clearance certificate and the non-money laundering clearance certificate as stipulated in the money laundering act of 2022.
Upon the receipt of these mentioned certificates and due verification, I will have your name shortlisted for the immediate release of your payment.
Please note that there is a provision now which allows you to receive your payment via cryptocurrency (Bitcoin) if you so wish.
Awaiting your urgent response and congratulations.
Regards,
Edward Paul.   
From: s**********9@gmail.com
To: ki59021@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-30 14:31:58
SUBJECT: Reply
Dear Friend,
I am happy to receive your positive response and I want to assure you that
there is no risk involved in this transaction and we will not be breaking
any laws. It is a financial rewarding transaction which has been carefully
mapped out and guaranteed to be successful if we both put in our best
cooperation to it.
If you have further questions, please do feel free to ask me, before I give
the details of the transaction and what is expected of each of us to do for
it to be successful. I will also appreciate it if you include your phone
and WhatsApp Number for effective communication.
Regards,
Sam.
From: s**********9@gmail.com
To: ki59021@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-01 02:30:39
SUBJECT: Reply
Dear Friend,
I am sorry this is coming late, first your information is confidential so
you have nothing to worry about. If you have a bitcoin wallet, I will
recommend we use that to receive the Money in question.
I will give you detailed information of the transaction in my next email,
can you provide me with your phone number and WhatsApp number for easy
communication.
Regards,
Sam Obidike.
From: s**********9@gmail.com
To: ki59021@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-01 17:13:31
SUBJECT: Reply
Dear April,
I have written to you and assured you that there is no risk involved in
this transaction, it is a carefully planned transaction that will only take
4-7 banking days to successfully conclude and everyone will smile.
Regards,
Sam.
From: s**********9@gmail.com
To: ki59021@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-01 17:38:51
SUBJECT: Re: Reply
Dear April,
I have asked you to provide me with your number so I can call you for
better communication, may I have your mobile number please.
Regards,
Sam.
From: s**********9@gmail.com
To: ki59021@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-02 12:09:52
SUBJECT: Reply
Dear April,
You keep asking the same question repeatedly and I have assured you that
this is a risk-free transaction. This transaction is about unclaimed funds
in one of our commercial banks. I got to know about it since a directive
was issued by the Federal Government of Nigeria directing the Central Bank
of Nigeria to call back all unclaimed payments from all commercial banks to
the treasury, which means that beneficiaries of such funds will never have
access to their payment again.
I do not know why your email was in this particular file and the amount is
$18.750M and I have this urge to go into partnership with you and get the
payment paid out to any designated bank account you provide as the
beneficiary of the funds.
I have written assuring you that since I am the director in charge of this
payment, everything required to get this to a successful conclusion is not
going to be an issue.
I need you to include your mobile/WhatsApp Number to this email, so I can
explain the procedure better to you.
Regards,
Sam Obidike.
From: s**********9@gmail.com
To: ki59021@l******s.email
Time: 2023-05-02 13:32:34
SUBJECT: Reply
I estimate 4-7 banking days

conversations.subject: SUBJECT:   Dear Sir,
conversations.body:
Dear Sir,
I write you as an independent financial consultant with the Central bank of Nigeria, which the Federal Government of Nigeria (FGN) asked to investigate some of the unclaimed payment of clients which they (FGN) believe should have been sorted out over the years, but for some reasons still remained unpaid.

You must provide the contract invoice for the payment you are claiming, in addition to that, you are to provide both the cross border clearance certificate and the non-money laundering clearance certificate as stipulated in the money laundering act of 2022.
Upon the receipt of these mentioned certificates and due verification, I will have your name shortlisted for the immediate release of your payment.
Please note that there is a provision now which allows you to receive your payment via cryptocurrency (Bitcoin) if you so wish.
Awaiting your urgent response and congratulations.
